name: CHOBBS: Chocolate Bunny Backup Squad
description:
Join the Chocolate Bunny Backup Squad as they solve the problem of the Easter Bunny's latest fad.

 

Read the story and help them find the right path and find the hidden eggs in this hybrid puzzle / hidden object game with 75 levels.

 

The story can be turned off from the settings level. It is written in Commonwealth English.

 

GAME 1 - PUZZLE - 25 Levels:

  Help the bunnies find the best route to their own eggs by placing the tiles on the path so that there is a direct route between them and their matching egg.  Take as long as you want to work out the path. The bunnies  won't start moving until you press the START button.

These levels will be exactly the same every time you play them.

 

  • Get gold by collecting at least 2 other eggs on the way - the 1st bunny to reach the egg takes it.
  • Get silver by collecting at least 1 other egg on the way.
  • Pass the level by helping all the bunnies reach their own eggs
  • Their paths cannot cross.

 

  • Casual:  You have as many tiles as you want to place on the route.
  • Expert:  You only have a limited number of tiles.

 

  GAME 2 - FIND 30 - 25 Levels:

  Find 30 of the same Easter egg in an ever-changing field of Easter Eggs.

Find 30 eggs without any mistakes for gold.

The eggs are randomly generated and will be different every time you play the level.

 

  • Casual: 
    • You are allowed to click on wrong eggs 10 times.
    • It's the same egg for the entire level.

 

  • Expert: 
    • The egg you must find will change after a few seconds.
    • There is a limited number of eggs before the level ends.
    • You are only allowed to click on wrong eggs 5 times.

 

  GAME 3 - EGG MATCH - 25 Levels:

  Find 30 Easter Eggs one a time or at least 25 to pass the level. 

When you find an egg then a new selection of eggs are placed.

Find 30 eggs without any mistakes for gold.

The eggs are randomly generated and will be different every time you play the level.

 

  • Casual: 
    • You are allowed to click on wrong eggs 10 times.
    • You can take as long as you want to find the egg and if you can't find it. there's a skip button so that you don't get stuck.

 

  • Expert: 
    • The egg you must find will change after a  few seconds.
    • You are only allowed to click on wrong eggs 5 times.

Your cell phone or tablet will have to have developer mode enabled to install an external .apk  If you don't have developer mode enabled please purchase it from Amazon instead.
